tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_inventory_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(100),
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    sell_date TIMESTAMP,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    transaction_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_sold INT,
    total_price DECIMAL,
    sales_date DATE
);
